English text: Have you delivered or received any duty suspended finished alcoholic product?
Welsh text: A ydych chi wedi dosbarthu neu dderbyn unrhyw gynnyrch alcoholaidd gorffenedig y gohiriwyd tollau arno?

English text: You need to tell us if you delivered finished alcoholic product to a duty suspended warehouse or received finished alcoholic product in duty suspense.
Welsh text: Mae angen i chi roi gwybod i ni a wnaethoch ddosbarthu cynnyrch alcoholaidd gorffenedig i warws lle mae tollau wedi’u gohirio, neu a wnaethoch dderbyn cynnyrch alcoholaidd gorffenedig o dan ohiriad tollau.

English text: Yes
Welsh text: Iawn

English text: No
Welsh text: Na

English text: Save and continue
Welsh text: Cadw a pharhau

English text: Select yes if you need to tell us about any duty suspended alcohol
Welsh text: Dewiswch ‘Iawn’ os oes angen i chi roi gwybod i ni am unrhyw alcohol y gohiriwyd tollau arno

English text: Select yes if you delivered or received any duty suspended finished alcoholic product
Welsh text: Dewiswch ‘Iawn’ os gwnaethoch ddosbarthu neu dderbyn unrhyw gynnyrch alcoholaidd gorffenedig y gohiriwyd tollau arno

English text: Duty suspended finished alcoholic product deliveries
Welsh text: Dosbarthiadau o gynhyrchion alcoholaidd gorffenedig y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt

English text: Calculate the volume of duty suspended finished alcoholic products
Welsh text: Cyfrifwch gyfaint y cynhyrchion alcoholaidd gorffenedig y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt

English text: For each type of alcohol you produce you need to tell us the volume of finished alcoholic products and the volume of pure alcohol in those finished alcoholic products.
Welsh text: Ar gyfer pob math o alcohol rydych chi’n ei gynhyrchu, mae angen i chi roi gwybod i ni beth yw cyfaint y cynhyrchion alcoholaidd gorffenedig a faint o alcohol pur sydd yn y cynhyrchion alcoholaidd gorffenedig hynny.

English text: Add together:
Welsh text: Bydd angen adio’r canlynol at ei gilydd:

English text: litres exported outside the UK (for example, ship stores)
Welsh text: litrau a allforiwyd i’r tu allan i’r DU (er enghraifft, storfeydd nwyddau llongau)

English text: litres delivered duty suspended to other UK registered premises and excise warehouses
Welsh text: litrau y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt, a ddosbarthwyd i warysau ecséis a safleoedd cofrestredig eraill yn y DU

English text: Then subtract:
Welsh text: Yna tynnwch:

English text: litres received under duty suspense from registered premises, excise warehouses and importation
Welsh text: litrau o dan ohiriad tollau, a dderbyniwyd oddi wrth safleoedd cofrestredig, warysau ecséis a mewnforio

English text: Use the same method to calculate the litres of pure alcohol in your duty suspended finished alcoholic products.
Welsh text: Defnyddiwch yr un dull i gyfrifo’r litrau o alcohol pur sydd yn eich cynhyrchion alcoholaidd gorffenedig y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt.

English text: Your answers will not change your duty calculation.
Welsh text: Ni fydd eich atebion yn newid eich cyfrifiad tollau.

English text: Continue
Welsh text: Parhau

English text: Tell us about your duty suspended beer
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am eich cwrw y gohiriwyd tollau arno

English text: You need to tell us about your net quantity of beer that is duty suspended, both as total litres and litres of pure alcohol (LPA).
Welsh text: Mae angen i chi roi gwybod i ni am swm net eich cwrw y gohiriwyd tollau arno, gan nodi cyfanswm y litrau yn ogystal â’r litrau o alcohol pur (LPA).

English text: What is the total net quantity of this beer?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm net y cwrw hwn?

English text: In litres, up to 2 decimal places.
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau, hyd at 2 le degol.

English text: What is the total net quantity of pure alcohol in this beer?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y cwrw hwn?

English text: In litres, up to 4 decimal places
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau, gan gynnwys 4 lle degol
Comments: I've translated "to 4" instead of "up to 4" for this row, because it deals with quantity of pure alcohol.

English text: Enter the total net quantity of [beer]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm net y [cwrw]

English text: Total net quantity of [beer] must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [cwrw] fod yn rhif

English text: Total net quantity of [beer] must be less than 1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [cwrw] fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of [beer] must be more than −1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [cwrw] fod yn fwy na −1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of [beer] must be a number up to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [cwrw] fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys hyd at 2 le degol

English text: Enter the total net quantity of pure alcohol in [beer]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y [cwrw]

English text: Total net quantity of pure alcohol must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net yr alcohol pur fod yn rhif

English text: Total net quantity of pure alcohol must be less than 1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net yr alcohol pur fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of pure alcohol must be more than −1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net yr alcohol pur fod yn fwy na −1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of pure alcohol must be a number up to 4 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net yr alcohol pur fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys 4 lle degol
Comments: I've translated "to 4" instead of "up to 4" for this row, because it deals with quantity of pure alcohol.

English text: Tell us about your duty suspended cider
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am eich seidr y gohiriwyd tollau arno

English text: You need to tell us about your net quantity of cider that is duty suspended, both as total litres and litres of pure alcohol (LPA).
Welsh text: Mae angen i chi roi gwybod i ni am swm net eich seidr y gohiriwyd tollau arno, gan nodi cyfanswm y litrau yn ogystal â’r litrau o alcohol pur (LPA).

English text: What is the total net quantity of this cider?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm net y seidr hwn?

English text: What is the total net quantity of pure alcohol in this cider?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y seidr hwn?

English text: Enter the total net quantity of [cider]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm net y [seidr]

English text: Total net quantity of [cider] must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [seidr] fod yn rhif

English text: Total net quantity of [cider] must be less than 1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [seidr] fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of [cider] must be more than −1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [seidr] fod yn fwy na −1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of [cider] must be a number up to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [seidr] fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys hyd at 2 le degol

English text: Enter the total net quantity of pure alcohol in [cider]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y [seidr]

English text: Tell us about your duty suspended wine
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am eich gwin y gohiriwyd tollau arno

English text: You need to tell us about your net quantity of wine that is duty suspended, both as total litres and litres of pure alcohol (LPA).
Welsh text: Mae angen i chi roi gwybod i ni am swm net eich gwin y gohiriwyd tollau arno, gan nodi cyfanswm y litrau yn ogystal â’r litrau o alcohol pur (LPA).

English text: What is the total net quantity of this wine?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm net y gwin hwn?

English text: What is the total net quantity of pure alcohol in this wine?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y gwin hwn?

English text: Enter the total net quantity of [wine]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm net y [gwin]

English text: Total net quantity of [wine] must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [gwin] fod yn rhif

English text: Total net quantity of [wine] must be less than 1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [gwin] fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of [wine] must be more than −1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [gwin] fod yn fwy na −1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of [wine] must be a number up to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [gwin] fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys hyd at 2 le degol

English text: Enter the total net quantity of pure alcohol in [wine]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y [gwin]

English text: Tell us about your duty suspended spirits
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am eich gwirodydd y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt

English text: You need to tell us about your net quantity of spirits that is duty suspended, both as total litres and litres of pure alcohol (LPA).
Welsh text: Mae angen i chi roi gwybod i ni am swm net eich gwirodydd y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt, gan nodi cyfanswm y litrau yn ogystal â’r litrau o alcohol pur (LPA).

English text: What is the total net quantity of these spirits?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm net y gwirodydd hyn?

English text: What is the total net quantity of pure alcohol in these spirits?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y gwirodydd hyn?

English text: Enter the total net quantity of [spirits]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm net y [gwirodydd]

English text: Total net quantity of [spirits] must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [gwirodydd] fod yn rhif

English text: Total net quantity of [spirits] must be less than 1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [gwirodydd] fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of [spirits] must be more than −1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [gwirodydd] fod yn fwy na −1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of [spirits] must be a number up to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [gwirodydd] fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys hyd at 2 le degol

English text: Enter the total net quantity of pure alcohol in [spirits]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y [gwirodydd]

English text: Tell us about your other fermented products with duty suspended
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am eich cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt

English text: You need to tell us about your net quantity of other fermented products that is duty suspended, both as total litres and litres of pure alcohol (LPA).
Welsh text: Mae angen i chi roi gwybod i ni am swm net eich cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt, gan nodi cyfanswm y litrau yn ogystal â’r litrau o alcohol pur (LPA).

English text: What is the total net quantity of these other fermented products?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm net y cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill hyn?

English text: What is the total net quantity of pure alcohol in these other fermented products?
Welsh text: Beth yw cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill hyn?

English text: Enter the total net quantity of [other fermented products]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm net y [cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill]

English text: Total net quantity of [other fermented products] must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill] fod yn rhif

English text: Total net quantity of [other fermented products] must be less than 1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill] fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of [other fermented products] must be more than −1 billion litres
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill] fod yn fwy na −1 biliwn o litrau

English text: Total net quantity of [other fermented products] must be a number up to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm net y [cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill] fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys hyd at 2 le degol

English text: Enter the total net quantity of pure alcohol in [other fermented products]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y [cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill]

English text: Check your answers
Welsh text: Gwirio’ch atebion

English text: Duty suspended deliveries
Welsh text: Dosbarthiadau y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt

English text: Total net quantity of duty suspended beer
Welsh text: Cyfanswm net y cwrw y gohiriwyd tollau arno

English text: Total net quantity of pure alcohol in this beer
Welsh text: Cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y cwrw hwn

English text: Total net quantity of duty suspended cider
Welsh text: Cyfanswm net y seidr y gohiriwyd tollau arno

English text: Total net quantity of pure alcohol in this cider
Welsh text: Cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y seidr hwn

English text: Total net quantity of duty suspended wine
Welsh text: Cyfanswm net y gwin y gohiriwyd tollau arno

English text: Total net quantity of pure alcohol in this wine
Welsh text: Cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y gwin hwn

English text: Total net quantity of duty suspended spirits
Welsh text: Cyfanswm net y gwirodydd y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt

English text: Total net quantity of pure alcohol in these spirits
Welsh text: Cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y gwirodydd hyn

English text: Total net quantity of duty suspended other fermented products
Welsh text: Cyfanswm net y cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt

English text: Total net quantity of pure alcohol in these other fermented products
Welsh text: Cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill hyn

English text: Change[ total net quantity of duty suspended beer]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm net y cwrw y gohiriwyd tollau arno]

English text: Change[ total net quantity of pure alcohol in this beer]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y cwrw hwn]

English text: Change[ total net quantity of duty suspended cider]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm net y seidr y gohiriwyd tollau arno]

English text: Change[ total net quantity of pure alcohol in this cider]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y seidr hwn]

English text: Change[ total net quantity of duty suspended wine]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm net y gwin y gohiriwyd tollau arno]

English text: Change[ total net quantity of pure alcohol in this wine]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y gwin hwn]

English text: Change[ total net quantity of duty suspended spirits]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm net y gwirodydd y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt]

English text: Change[ total net quantity of pure alcohol in this spirits]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y gwirodydd hyn]
Comments: We have translated "in these spirits", instead of "in this spirits".

English text: Change[ total net quantity of duty suspended other fermented products]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm net y cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill y gohiriwyd tollau arnynt]

English text: Change[ total net quantity of pure alcohol in this other fermented products]
Welsh text: Newid[ cyfanswm net yr alcohol pur yn y cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill hyn]
Comments: We have translated "in these other fermented products", instead of "in this other fermented products".

English text: Continue
Welsh text: Parhau
